extendedInfo.description: Ready to take your game to the next level? We hope soâbecause Shootout is back. The updated version of the #1 lacrosse game is loaded up with new Brine gear and high-resolution graphics. And with a brutal new All-Star level to test you, this Shootout isnât just better. Itâs meaner.ACCLAIM FOR SHOOTOUTâOverall, I believe Shootout is a welcome addition to the lives of lacrosse players, and I love that this forward-thinking innovation came from a company founded way back in 1922. Brine Lacrosse continues to lead the way!ââ Krieg Shaw, laxallstars.comâIt is an addictive game, and a necessary download for all LAX fans from 8-88.ââ Andrew Weiner, examiner.com âBrine Shootoutâ¦ easily the best app ever.â â @RealSammyP_03âLoving the Brine Shootout app.ââ @revED_upâBrine Shootout. All day everyday. #addictedââ @TabbiLevengoodâThey finally made a lacrosse game app. Clearly my prayers have been answered.ââ @caaitlynalexisâPlaying Brine Shootout instead of paying attention in class.ââ @RyanStranglandFEATURESâ Total control over your shots: Whip one in over the goalieâs shoulder, bounce one off the ground through trafficâeven go five-hole if youâre really feeling it. Or just unleash a Power Shot to knock over every unlucky defender in your way.â Five increasingly tough levels to tackle: Backyard, High School, College, Pro, and new All-Star.â A full arsenal of unlockable Brine gear helps you up your gameâand your scores.â A built-in, worldwide leaderboard lets you see how you measure up to the best (or donât).â Really light it up? Share your score on Facebook & Twitterâand dare others to beat it.â Made, tested, and played by the brand thatâs been a leader in lacrosse since 1922.HOW TO PLAYâ Once the whistle blows, simply flick up to shoot. Flick direction, speed and distance all have an impact on the placement of your shot.â To keep the clock going, keep scoring. Once youâve scored three goals in a row, every goal adds :01 to your time; once youâve hit 10 in a row, that bonus doubles to :02. Until you missâthen youâre back to square one.â At the bottom-left corner of the screen is your power meter. Every goal and defender you knock down helps fill this up. When itâs completely full, you can perform a Power Shot.â To perform a Power Shot, simply flick down then upâsimilar to how youâd draw a checkmark.â Power Shots can knock over defenders. Each defender you knock down will give you a time bonus that matches what youâre currently receiving for goals (if youâre in the middle of a 10+ goal streak, for example, youâll get :02 for every defender you knock down).

reviews.title: Lot of Fun!
reviews.comment: Addictive and it makes me want to be on the field taking shots.  Does get laggy sometimes but overall a great game. I hope they can keep adding more!
reviews.author: Harry Gordon

reviews.title: Great. powershot dont react usually
reviews.comment: Powershot doea not normally react to \"v\" motion.
reviews.author: Charlie Stiles

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Amazing game
reviews.author: Matthew Rodriguez

reviews.title: works awsome on galaxy s3
reviews.comment: awsome game overall,super addictive,runs great.u have absolutly nothing negative to say about it. by far my favorite game.
reviews.author: Carly Shoemaker

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Pretty laggy please fix
reviews.author: Shawn Barbalato

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: A little slow and glitchy every once in a while

reviews.comment: awesome

reviews.title: No good!
reviews.comment: First, half the time it fails to open. Second, when it does open I can\'t play it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: The game is good but my keeps getting stopped by phantom equipment. I would shot it between the stick and helmet and the red circle would be right between it and it would stop the ball when it should be a goal. Also, I\'ve hit the post and it bounced into the goal and got nothing. Good so far but needs to fix this asap
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazinggg
reviews.comment: This is so great and its gonna help expose the game. Great job Brine !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yes!
reviews.comment: Only lacrosse game and made me happy! Awesome :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Funnest game I\'ve played in a while. Good graphics and real shafts and heads
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: This is a great game to play when i am  re\"lax\"in\' but i cant figure out how to get the power shot
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Thank you brine. Lax needed this. Thanks for taking the leep for us all. Maybe in the next decade itll have enough coverage to become an olympic sport
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but
reviews.comment: Its a great app i just beat it i have all the sticks and difficulties please add more gear game modes and levels please and it will be the best app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great on Motorola Droid Bionic
reviews.comment: Finally!!! A Lacrosse game for Android, Amazing. The game is a masterpiece. It\'s simple in terms of how it runs and challenging in terms of passing levels and upgrading equipms, and I mean that in a fun good way. A must have for all the lacrosse players and fanatics like myself. Works great on Moto Droid Bionic. Thanks and keep up the great work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work...Too bad!
reviews.comment: Freezes up. No option to exit. It\'s slow. The game is good, the app isn\'t. Uninstalling until its fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: meow
reviews.comment: Ginooo!! id like a tendy mode though i think that would be filthy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: Definitely the BEST Lacrosse game for Android. It was easy to unlock the levels, but I can\'t get the F55! Maybe I should practice in the College level instead of just getting constantly shut down in Pro.
reviews.author: A Google User
